title: Windows updated this morning, now LOL lags FPS wise :/
body: I updated Windows today and now my LOL is lagging. I use to get a solid 60 FPS but ever since I updated I get 30-40 FPS now which fluctuates a lot.

replies.body: Those darn updates! It sounds like you may have installed the Windows 10 Anniversary update, which enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature that can sometimes cause issues with FPS and system lockups. I recommend you [disable the feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for now, to see if it causes any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WtRWfYoG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-23T21:01:44.609+0000)
>
> Those darn updates! It sounds like you may have installed the Windows 10 Anniversary update, which enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature that can sometimes cause issues with FPS and system lockups. I recommend you [disable the feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for now, to see if it causes any change.

It was already turned off. I'm still lagging?

Darn, that's usually the fix after the newest update. Another potential fix could be updating your graphics drivers or some of the other steps included in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if that worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WtRWfYoG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-23T21:01:44.609+0000)
>
> Those darn updates! It sounds like you may have installed the Windows 10 Anniversary update, which enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature that can sometimes cause issues with FPS and system lockups. I recommend you [disable the feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for now, to see if it causes any change.

I'll do that right now! Thanks for the tip Targon :DDD
